source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Maya Modelling - Beginner Projects
items.headline: Creating a game ready asset
objectives_summary: Create 3D models using Autodesk Maya software that can be used as part of their college course work
Create their own game content to suit platforms currently relevant to their Games Development courses.

items.title: The 5 Pillars of Rigging in 3D! (Maya)
items.headline: An easy to follow course that explains the most vital rigging fundamentals!
objectives_summary: Students will learn some vital tips and fundamentals for rigging

items.title: 3D Modeling and Texturing Interior Office in Autodesk Maya
items.headline: A step by step guide to Modeling and Texturing an Office Interior in Autodesk Maya
objectives_summary: Model in-organic 3D objects such as Table, chair etc.,
Texture in-organic 3D objects such as Table, chair etc.,
Create simple lighting and render a interior office scene.

items.title: Learn Modular Level Building for CryEngine with Maya

visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive

items.headline: Learn to create a warehouse environment for games using the modular workflow!
objectives_summary: Learn to build a modular warehouse environment using Maya and CryEngine
Build and Light a scene inside of CryEngine
Setup the scene for your final renders

items.title: Level up your VFX! Go from After Effects and Learn Nuke
items.headline: Learn VFX Compositing in Nuke the easy way.  Made for people who have experience in After Effects or Photoshop!
objectives_summary: Easily transition over from After Effects into Nuke, and apply what you already know to a Node based software!
Comparing the two interfaces, and learning how to do the basic tasks
Learning the differences between the software, and why Node based compositing is superior

items.title: Create a 3D character in Blender from scratch

visible_instructors.title: Raymond Gabriel
visible_instructors.job_title: 3D Generalist - Founder of RG3D Animation Studio
visible_instructors.name: Raymond

items.headline: Step by step guide to model a 3D character and texture it
objectives_summary: Create a character 3D model
Add materials and textures to your character
Rendering images for your character

items.title: VFX and Virtual Reality Theory Basics

visible_instructors.title: Vicki Lau
visible_instructors.job_title: Multi-Hyphenate Artist, VFX Pro, TEDx Speaker, Author
visible_instructors.name: Vicki

items.headline: Beginner's guide to the terms, types and different use cases of virtual reality (VR) in the visual effects industry.
objectives_summary: Understand the current VR terms and vocabulary used in the visual effects industry
Know the different types of software used in the industry for different types of VR
Learn from the different real-life use cases of VR in the visual effects industry

items.title: Animatron University - Intermediate Course
items.headline: Animation for the rest of us!
objectives_summary: Create HTML5 animation
Use Animatron - a FREE web based software - to create fun, engaging and exciting animations

items.headline: Animation for the rest of us!
objectives_summary: Create HTML5 animation
Use Animatron - a FREE web based software - to create fun, engaging and exciting animations

items.headline: Learn how to do basics of Modelling, Texturing, Grouping, Making Scenes, Making Presentation Layout, Giving Dimensions
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of Sketchup interface and tools and start using Sketchup
Learn how to do basics of Modeling, Texturing, Grouping, Making Scenes, Making Presentation Layout, Giving Dimensions

items.title: Explore Multiple UV Unwrapping Options for Games and Film

visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive

items.headline: Learn the major differences between four of the most popular standalone UV Unwrapping tools with practical examples!
objectives_summary: Understand several options when working with UVs for 3d
Make an educated decision on which of these 4 softwares are right for them

items.title: marvelous designer 6.5 basic
items.headline: learn basic of marvelous designer with practical example .
objectives_summary: after finish this course they will able to know about marvelousdesigner 6.5,and they able to create pattern,dress,simulation dress,
exporting mash,export garments and many more technique about marvelousdesigner software.

items.title: Hand-Painted Tiled Textures in Blender 2.7x
items.headline: Learn the techniques to make hand painted textures you can use over and over again for your projects.
objectives_summary: Paint a variety of textures used in video games.
Paint tile-able textures within Blender.

items.title: Advance PowerPoint Animation
items.headline: Animate your PowerPoint slides with 18 simple animation effects
objectives_summary: You will learn how to make an image appear in different ways using options such as split, wipe, grow/shrink and zoom
You will learn how to create parallax effect
You will learn how to create timeline effect

items.title: Master in Adobe After Effects CC 2015 Basics
items.headline: In this free course you can learn the basics of adobe after effects
objectives_summary: Basics of Animation
Basics of Adobe After Effects CC 2015
Understand the interface of After Effects
